articles.author: Justin Jackson
articles.title: EPIC study highlights Mediterranean diet impact on obesity-linked cancer risk - Medical Xpress
articles.description: Higher adherence to the Mediterranean diet is associated with a modest reduction in the risk of obesity-related cancers, according to research conducted by the European Prospective Investigation Into Cancer and Nutrition (EPIC) study. The study found a 6% low…
